repos_data.description: Full-stack .Net 10 Clean Architecture (Microservices, Modular Monolith, Monolith), Blazor, Angular 21, React 19, Vue 3.5, BFF with YARP, NextJs 16, Domain-Driven Design, CQRS, SOLID, Asp.Net Core Identity Custom Storage, OpenID Connect, EF Core, OpenTelemetry, SignalR, Background Services, Health Checks, Rate Limiting, Clouds (Azure, AWS, GCP), ...
Simple, lightweight, yet powerful way to build real-time web apps.
